players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "That is a lie. I am a villager. Why would you frame me, Diana?"
You: "Diana is lying. If she were detective, why reveal so early? She's mafia trying to frame me."
Charlie: "I believe Diana. She found Bob to be the mafioso, and I trust her investigation."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. My investigation is clear. Charlie, vote with me to end this."
